text: The Burkinabe ambassador to Austria is the official representative of the Government in Ouagadougou to the Government of Austria. He is concurrently accredited in Belgrade (Serbia), Zagreb (Croatia), Budapest (Hungary), Prague (Czech Republic), Brünn (Slovakia) Ljubljana (Slovenia), (United Nations Office at Vienna).BURKINA-Faso == List of Representatives == {| class="wikitable sortable" !| Diplomatic accreditation !| ambassador !| Observations !| List of Prime Ministers of Burkina Faso !| List of Chancellors of Austria !| Term end |- | |Thomas Sanon | |Kadré Désiré Ouédraogo |Viktor Klima | |- | |Noellie Marie Béatrice Damiba | |Paramanga Ernest Yonli |Wolfgang Schüssel | |- | |Salif Diallo | |Tertius Zongo |Werner Faymann | |- | |Paul Robert Tiendrebeogo |28 mars 2012Paul Robert Tiendrebeogo |Luc-Adolphe Tiao |Werner Faymann | |- | |Solange Rita Bogore Agneketom |Solange Rita Bogore Agneketom |Luc-Adolphe Tiao |Werner Faymann | |- | |Eric Ismaël Zoungrana |Chargé d'affaires |Yacouba Isaac Zida |Werner Faymann | |- | |Saïdou Zongo | |Yacouba Isaac Zida |Werner Faymann | |- | |Solange Rita Bogore Agneketom | |Yacouba Isaac Zida |Werner Faymann | |- | |Saïdou Zongo |Chargé d'affaires |Paul Kaba Thieba |Werner Faymann | |- | |Dieudonné Kéré | |Paul Kaba Thieba |Christian Kern | |} == References == Austria Burkina Faso
title: List of ambassadors of Burkina Faso to Austria
